alwaysShowBorder.name: Always Show Border
alwaysShowBorder.hint: Always render the token's border. Overriden if a Token has 'Hide Border' checked.

altOrientationDefault.name: Flip default orientation
altOrientationDefault.hint: If enabled, the larger side of even sized tokens will be on the bottom or right instead of the top or left

borderWidth.name: Border Width
borderWidth.hint: Specify the width of the token's border

borderBehindToken.name: Keep Border Behind Token
borderBehindToken.hint: Render the token's border behind the token instead of in front.

fillBorder.name: Fill Border Contents
fillBorder.hint: Add a translucent color to the token's border contents.

swapOrientation.name: Toggle Alternate Orientation
swapOrientation.hint: Toggles orientation for controlled hex tokens.

altOrientation.label: Alternate Orientation
altOrientation.notes: Flip the orientation of the token

hideBorder.label: Hide Border
hideBorder.notes: Hide the token's border. Overrides Module setting 'Always Show Border.'
